attr.title: Triple Swap Tower
attr.desc: Triple Swap Tower is a frantic roguelite which puts you in control of three different heroes. Swap fast between them as you fell waves of enemies, then power them up! How will you build your party?
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Download the right version using the Steam console and copy all the game files to /ports/tripleswaptower/assets.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3971630/Triple_Swap_Tower  
Run Steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the 1.3 version by typing: `download_depot 3971630 3971631 1260866337614850807` in the console.   
When the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder, copy all the game files to /ports/tripleswaptower/assets
